snippet: HERTZ--Judith. We note with sorrow the passing of our longtime member Judith Hertz and extend sincerest condolences to her bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl, President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
lead_paragraph: HERTZ--Judith. We note with sorrow the passing of our longtime member Judith Hertz and extend sincerest condolences to her bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl, President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
